name: For her majesty the Princess !
description:
*YOU CAN NOW CHANGE THE KEYBOARD LAYER IN OPTION ;) AND IT WORKS*

Protect the princess against the force of evil in this explosive action game !

How to play
  • Move you character with WASD/ZQSD (keyboard layout changeable in the options).
  • Explode yourself with J to kill the enemies.
  • You can make up to 2 copies of yourself at some positions to help you defend the queen. To create one somewhere, double press Q/A or E.
  • To make your clones explode, press a single time on Q/A or E.
Made in 72h for Ludum Dare 46 (by one and a half person ;p).
